src:
Hasil FP2 MotoGP Malaysia: Quartararo Pecahkan Rekor Waktu Pedrosa
01 Nov 2019, 15:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Petronas Yamaha SRT, Fabio Quartararo, kembali sukses mencatatkan waktu tercepat dalam sesi latihan bebas kedua (FP2) MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang pada Jumat (1/11/2019). Ia mencetak 1 menit 58,576 detik.
Ia mengalahkan catatan waktunya sendiri di FP1, di mana ia mencatat 1 menit 59,027 detik. Catatan ini pun berhasil mematahkan rekor catatan waktu Dani Pedrosa (Repsol Honda), yakni 1 menit 59,053 detik yang dibubuhkan dalam sesi kualifikasi pada 2015.
Quartararo diikuti oleh pebalap Ducati Team, Andrea Dovizioso, di posisi kedua, dan pebalap Monster Energy Yamaha, Valentino Rossi, di posisi ketiga.
Sementara itu posisi keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Petronas Yamaha SRT lainnya, Franco Morbidelli, dan pebalap Pramac Racing, Jack Miller.
Berikut hasil FP2 MotoGP Malaysia 2019.
text:
Malaysian MotoGP FP2 Results: Quartararo Sets Pedrosa Time Record
Nov 01 2019, 15:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Yamaha SRT Petronas racer, Fabio Quartararo, again successfully recorded the fastest time in the second free practice session (FP2) Malaysian MotoGP at the Sepang Circuit on Friday (1/11/2019). He scored 1 minute 58.576 seconds.
He beat his own time record in FP1, where he recorded 1 minute 59.027 seconds. This note also managed to break the Dani Pedrosa (Repsol Honda) record, which is 1 minute 59.053 seconds which was put on in the qualifying session in 2015.
Quartararo was followed by Ducati Team rider Andrea Dovizioso in second place, and Monster Energy Yamaha racer Valentino Rossi in third.
Meanwhile the fourth and fifth positions were each occupied by another Yamaha SRT Petronas driver, Franco Morbidelli, and Pramac Racing driver Jack Miller.
Following are the results of the 2019 MotoGP Malaysia Malaysian.
